title: Error in obtaining emblem
body:
Not a huge issue but I was just wondering if I'm the only one receiving an error in obtaining the new Demacian emblem, I have refreshed the page as it has asked me to do so many times, I have also gone and closed the website entirely logging out and re-entering my name and password. if I'm doing something wrong could I get advice as to how to fix the issue.

Thanks Guys, OGNinjaBean{{summoner:13}}

replies.body: If the Demacia universe page is giving you an error when you click to receive the icon, it could be fixed as simple as clearing your browser history or cookies. [**Here's**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) a little guide that goes over several different steps that could help you grab that icon!
